name: creative-screenshots
description: Capture screenshots of Campaign Manager Tags

scripts.cloud-run-build: gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/$(gcloud config get-value project)/$npm_package_config_service_name
scripts.cloud-run-deploy-only: gcloud alpha run deploy $npm_package_config_service_name --image gcr.io/$(gcloud config get-value project)/$npm_package_config_service_name --memory 2G --update-env-vars CLOUD_PROJECT_ID=$(gcloud config get-value project),CLOUD_RUN_REGION=$npm_package_config_cloud_run_region,CLOUD_BUCKET=$npm_package_config_cloud_bucket,FILE_PATH_PATTERN=$npm_package_config_file_path_pattern,SCREENSHOT_PADDING=$npm_package_config_screenshot_padding,SCREENSHOT_QUALITY=$npm_package_config_screenshot_quality,MS_BEFORE_SCREENSHOT=$npm_package_config_ms_before_screenshot,MS_BEFORE_SCREENSHOT_INSTREAM=$npm_package_config_ms_before_screenshot_instream,NUMBER_OF_SCREENSHOTS=$npm_package_config_number_of_screenshots --platform managed --service-account=$npm_package_config_service_account
scripts.cloud-run-deploy: npm run cloud-run-build && npm run cloud-run-deploy-only

author: Google Inc.
